Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'Damp moonlight seeps through the dark trees.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The enemies aren't following us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "What's the situation on your side?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No sign of the Red Tide here either...', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "...I didn't ask you that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa walks over, checks your protective suit, and relaxes a bit when the Punishing Virus concentration is down.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Let's rest here for a bit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Those things in the woods are relentless.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The forest where Luna is lies outside Aerospace City\'s "Clean Zone", so the enemies here are especially tough.'}
{3: 'On the way back, you were chased by Hetero-Creatures and barely made it out of the forest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'Just as you start to speak, a loud buzzing fills your M.I.N.D. connection.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "It's like a thousand bells ringing, stabbing pain in your ears. Your vision goes black as something disconnects from your mind."}
{3: 'It\'s "The Shackles".'}
{2: 'The Shackles are loosening...', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Did you... hear that?', 3: '34'}
{3: 'Consciousness is buried in freezing mud, bells echoing through mind.'}
{3: "She rushes over, checks the protective suit's readings, and frowns."}
{3: 'A needle goes in, the cold liquid mixing with hot blood. The sharp pain pulls back a small portion of consciousness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "You're heavily infected. It's probably just ringing in your ears.", 4: '1'}
{3: "No, it's not ringing in your ears."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "It's just your imagination.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the blurry vision, the falling snow makes weird shapes as Vanessa purses her lips.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Break's over. We need to move, now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After checking the route on a portable terminal, Vanessa grabs your arm and heads back to the rendezvous point before you can speak.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1122.jpg'}
{3: 'After crossing a few snow hills, the lights of the rendezvous point come into view. A familiar figure runs toward you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: 'Vanessa, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Did something happen back at the settlement?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Emma', 3: "According to the latest data, the Punishing Virus concentration at the rendezvous point has spiked. It's above the survival threshold.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Two human groups are still inside... they haven't been evacuated...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evacuate now.', 3: '63', 4: "We can't wait any longer.", 5: '63'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "But the vehicles from Aerospace City haven't returned yet...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Get the vehicles' coordinates. Head in their direction.", 3: '65'}
{2: 'Pack up and leave, on foot, now.', 3: '66'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: '...Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: 'Patrol teams, help with the evacuation, now!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The command is clear, prompting the remaining humans to move out.'}
{3: 'Leaving behind heavy gear, the residents grab essentials and rush out, confused.'}
{3: "With no time to explain, everyone heads toward Aerospace City with the patrol's help."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1121.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'The lights around the Great Tombstone are going out one by one.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5101_04.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1121.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Standing at the edge of the camp, you stare at the forest where Luna was, a faint buzzing lingering in your M.I.N.D. connection.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the buzzing glitches. Emma pauses, looking toward the distant mountains and forest.'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "What's going on...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then, her device vibrates, pulling her attention back.'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "【kuroname】, the Punishing Virus concentration's dropping, we...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are we done packing?', 3: '89'}
{2: 'Emma', 3: "Huh? I'm ready, but the Punishing Virus concentration...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's go then. We're running out of time.", 3: '91'}
{3: 'Emma stops, interrupted again. Something clicks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1107.jpg'}
{3: "Avoiding Emma's eyes, you look back at the mountains. The forest is quiet, the snow and dead branches composing a mournful song."}
{3: 'Regardless, that faint light has gone out in the dark.'}
